title: Garage Open Night: Suspension Lab
summary: Hands-on suspension workshop led by Rado. Bring your own scooter or use the demo rigs.

title: Urban Rideout + Photo Session
summary: Community showcase ride weaving through heritage streets with golden-hour photography support.

title: Community Build Swap Meet
summary: Swap parts, pitch your project, and sign up for winter storage plans. Lunch provided.
